title: "Game Changer" or "Overenthusiastic Drunk Acquaintance"? Generative AI Use by Blind and Low Vision Software Professionals in the Workplace
dimension: AI Threat Recognition and Incident Response
summary: The software development workplace poses numerous technical and collaborative accessibility challenges for blind and low vision software professionals (BLVSPs).
